module.neobots.move_to.tooltip.descripti: Orders to the bot to move to the selected position.
module.neobots.deposit.tooltip.descripti: Orders to the bot to take matching items from _its inventory_ and store them in _the container_.
module.neobots.deposit.tooltip.no_target: • To: Right Click on a Container
module.neobots.deposit.tooltip.skip: • Skip if no item is possible to be delivered
module.neobots.withdraw.tooltip.descript: Orders to the bot to take matching items from _the container_ and store them in _its inventory_.
module.neobots.withdraw.tooltip.no_targe: • From: Right Click on a Container
module.neobots.withdraw.tooltip.skip: • Skip if no item is possible to be delivered
